instruction: Compose an ode poem based on the following topic.
output:
Oh! Generosity! 
Dawn of a brighter day 
Your power so serene
In the hearts of all men

Your beauty lies in giving
From the depths of one's soul
Helping others in need
From one's own control

Your grace is boundless
Your spirit full of fire
Your goodness always
Radiates with desire

Oh! Generosity! 
You are the hope of mankind
Bringing love and joy
To ease one's mind

Your radiant light
Shines eternal day
Casting away the shadows
To lead the way
